snippet: Citing a report by investigators that she had hired, Sandra Arroyo Salgado, a judge and the former wife of Mr. Nisman, said, “Suicide and an accident are totally ruled out.”
abstract: Sandra Arroyo Salgado, Argentine judge and former wife of Alberto Nisman, federal prosecutor who died of gunshot wound to head after making accusations against Argentine Pres Cristina Fernandez de Kirchner, claims that Nisman was murdered; investigators have yet to establish whether Nisman shot himself or was killed.
lead_paragraph: Citing a report by investigators that she had hired, Sandra Arroyo Salgado, a judge and the former wife of Mr. Nisman, said, “Suicide and an accident are totally ruled out.”

headline.main: Alberto Nisman, Argentine Prosecutor, Was Killed, His Ex-Wife Says
headline.print_headline: Prosecutor in Argentina Was Killed, Ex-Wife Says
